title: The effects of crystal structure on the chemical durability of yttrium disilicate
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13997-14007
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01072H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Keith Bryce, Kun Yang, Mingxin Li, Dong Zhao, Jie Lian
Elemental release: amorphous Y2Si2O7 is leached in pH 3 nitric acid. Post-leaching characterization of the leachate and pellet surface indicates a preferential release of Y, and the formation of an SiO2 alteration layer on the surface of the pellet.
